arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs West Ham United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: West Ham United travel to Bournemouth on Saturday, aiming to secure a third consecutive Premier League victory for the first time this season. The Hammers have found a new lease of life under Nuno Espírito Santo. However, they face a formidable test against a Bournemouth side that has been exceptional at home. The Cherries, despite […] The post Bournemouth vs West Ham United – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bournemouth welcome West Ham to the Vitality Stadium on Saturday, looking to arrest a sudden dip in form. After an impressive start to the season, consecutive defeats before the international break have stalled Bournemouth’s progress. Consequently, manager Andoni Iraola will demand a strong response from his players to avoid a third straight loss. The Cherries […] The post Bournemouth vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola foresees West Ham ‘getting better’ under Nuno Espirito Santo
arts.sum: And to win now, I think two games back-to-back, it's very difficult in the Premier League to do this and I suppose they come with confidence in kind of in a good place. But I know that I think all the games we've played against West Ham in the league, we were reviewing this week and have been draws.

arts.ttl: Hammers injuries ahead of Bournemouth | Opportunity knocks
arts.sum: With Lucas Paquetá serving a one match suspension after his fifth yellow card picked up just before the international break, Nuno was always going to have to change the winning side which saw off Burnley. However the news that Freddie Potts is still struggling and may miss the trip to Bournemouth offers a further challenge […] Source

arts.ttl: Hammers Biggest Test Yet? Bournemouth v West Ham Discussion & Debate!
arts.sum: Join me (Gonzo) and my Hammers Chat partner in crime as we look ahead to what is sure to be a crunch clash in Saturday’s West Ham vs Bournemouth fixture in our video preview. arts.ttl: Premier League reschedules January fixtures for TV picks and UEFA clashes
arts.sum: Key January and February fixtures shift as Sky Sports and TNT Sports lock in broadcast slots, with Forest and Villa clashes moved due to European ties, per Premier League release.
